ing: 3 cups chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as NutellaÂ®), melted
2 cups marshmallow cream (such as Marshmallow FluffÂ®), melted
n: Peanut Butter, Marshmallow, Dark Chocolate, Strawberry, and NutellaÂ® Bark
des: "Melted peanut butter, marshmallow, dark chocolate, NutellaÂ®, and strawberry bark is the new thing. It's so unbelievably delicious you won't know what to do!"
ins:
Line a rimmed baking sheet with waxed paper.
Place strawberries in a large bowl. Using a hand masher, mash into a coarse puree. Add melted chocolate, peanut butter, chocolate-hazelnut spread, and marshmallow cream. Mix well to combine. Pour onto baking sheet.
Transfer baking sheet to the refrigerator and chill until set, about 1 hour. Serve chilled.
